  ... 
) [inline]

Create a new native object of type T.

Parameters:
T The type of the object's class.
proto The prototype to be used. If null, the class' default prototype will be used.
... The parameters to the constructor of T.
Returns:
The new object.

object flusspferd::create_object ( object const &  proto = object()  ) 

Create a simple object.

Creates a new object with prototype proto. If proto is null, Object.prototype will be used.

Parameters:
proto The object to use as prototype.
Returns:
The new object.
